Title: Relates to requiring high-sugar beverages to be labeled with a safety warning
Summary: Requires high-sugar beverages to be labeled with a safety warning stating that the beverage contains 100% or more of the FDA recommended daily intake of added sugar.
LawCode: Add ยง204-e, Ag & Mkts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the agriculture and markets law, in relation to the labeling of high-sugar beverages with warnings
